title: tame_your_files
text: tame_your_files provides small, composable helpers for analyzing disk usage, finding duplicates, and visualizing directories without modifying the filesystem.

title: tame_your_files
text: tame_your_files provides small, composable helpers for analyzing disk usage, finding duplicates, and visualizing directories without modifying the filesystem.

title: tame_your_files
text:
Quickstart
from pathlib import Path
from tame_your_files import largest_files, files_to_free_space

root = Path(".")
largest = largest_files(root, n=5)
targets = files_to_free_space(root, target_bytes=10_000_000)

print([item.path.name for item in largest])
print(sum(item.size_bytes for item in targets))

title: tame_your_files
text:
Duplicate detection
from tame_your_files.find_duplicates import find_duplicates

duplicates = find_duplicates(".", method="content")
print(len(duplicates))

title: tame_your_files

Directory visualization
from tame_your_files.visualize_dir import visualize_dir

fig = visualize_dir(".")
fig.show()
